divs: Sighting Detailsin my house in bed, a roar like a blast furnice moving over the house seeming like it was low in altitude, my first thought was a train, but as i listened more, i knew it was not a train. i could hear the sound moving from w. or n.w. to e. to e.s.. i felt excited, eager to see what it was i rushed to the front door to see, but6 it was gone before i got there. i have worked around blast furnice's and i know that sound. have'nt heard it since two nites after.
trends: There have been 3 other sightings in Kings Mountain
There were no other sightings in Kings Mountain on or around August 25th 2013
Summary: was laying in bed when i heard a roar like a blast furnice moving over the house, i got up to see what it was but it was gone, this happened again the second nite after
